statements.select: /* Dash_SQL.selectDashMenuList - 대시보드 메뉴관리 */ SELECT M.MNU_CD , M.MNU_NM , M.ETC , M.MNU_FLE_NM , M.ORD , M.USE_YN , CASE WHEN U.USER_ID IS NOT NULL THEN 'Y' ELSE 'N' END AS MNU_USE_YN FROM DASH_MNU_INFO M LEFT JOIN USER_DASH_MNU U ON ( M.MNU_CD = U.MNU_CD AND U.USER_ID = #id# ) WHERE 1=1 AND M.USE_YN = 'Y' ORDER BY M.ORD

/* Dash_SQL.selectDashChart1List - 1.민원현황(상수,급수공사에 대한 민원구분별) */ SELECT APL_CDE , APL_CDE_NAM , APL_CDE_NAM AS NAM , NVL(SUM(CNT),0) AS DATA_VAL , NVL(SUM(CNT2),0) AS DATA_VAL2 FROM ( SELECT m.APL_CDE ,m.APL_CDE_NAM ,d.GRP_NM ,d.CNT ,d.CNT2 FROM (SELECT DTL_CD AS APL_CDE , CD_NM AS APL_CDE_NAM FROM CD_DTL_INFO WHERE 1=1 AND MST_CD = 'APL_CDE' /*민원구분*/ AND DEL_YN = 'N' UNION ALL SELECT ' ' AS APL_CDE , '선택안함' AS APL_CDE_NAM FROM DUAL WHERE 1=1 ORDER BY 1) M , ( SELECT '상수공사' as GRP_NM , NVL(A.APL_CDE,' ') AS APL_CDE , A.CNT_NUM , 1 as CNT , 0 as CNT2 FROM WTT_WSER_MA A , WTT_CONS_MA M WHERE M.CNT_NUM = A.CNT_NUM AND A.RCV_YMD LIKE NVL(#pYm#, TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYYMM')) || '%' UNION ALL SELECT '급수공사' as GRP_NM , NVL(A.APL_CDE,' ') AS APL_CDE , A.CNT_NUM , 0 as CNT , 1 as CNT2 FROM WTT_WSER_MA A , WTT_SPLY_MA M WHERE M.CNT_NUM = A.CNT_NUM AND A.RCV_YMD LIKE NVL(#pYm#, TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYYMM')) || '%' ) D WHERE 1=1 AND M.APL_CDE = D.APL_CDE(+) ) GROUP BY APL_CDE, APL_CDE_NAM ORDER BY DECODE(APL_CDE,' ','APL99999',APL_CDE)

/* Dash_SQL.selectDashChart2List - 2.소모품별 재고현황(금일기준) */ SELECT M.PDH_NUM , M.MNG_CDE_NAM , M.PDT_NAM , M.IN_AMT /*입고수량*/ , M.TOT_USE_AMT /*사용량*/ , M.IN_AMT - TOT_USE_AMT AS CUR_STCK_CNT /*현재고*/ , M.PDT_NAM AS NAM , M.IN_AMT - TOT_USE_AMT AS DATA_VAL FROM (SELECT M.PDH_NUM , M.PDT_CAT_CDE , NVL(FN_GET_CD_DTL_INFO_NAME('PDT_CAT_CDE',M.PDT_CAT_CDE),M.PDT_CAT_CDE) AS MNG_CDE_NAM , M.PDT_NAM , NVL(SUM(A.IN_AMT),0) AS IN_AMT , NVL(SUM(CASE WHEN M.PDT_CAT_CDE = 'PDT_CAT_CDE001' THEN B.PDH_CNT /*소모품구분(소모품)*/ WHEN M.PDT_CAT_CDE = 'PDT_CAT_CDE002' THEN B.PDH_AMT /*소모품구분(오일)*/ ELSE 0 END),0) AS TOT_USE_AMT /*총사용량*/ FROM FMS_PDJT_MA M LEFT JOIN FMS_PDJT_IN_HT A ON ( M.PDH_NUM = A.PDH_NUM ) /*소모품 입고*/ LEFT JOIN FMS_PDJT_HT B ON ( M.PDH_NUM = B.PDH_NUM ) /*소모품 사용*/ WHERE 1=1 AND M.USE_YN = 'Y' GROUP BY M.PDH_NUM, M.PDT_CAT_CDE, M.PDT_NAM ORDER BY 1 ) M

/* Dash_SQL.selectDashChart3List - 3.점검현황(금일기준) */ SELECT M.DTL_CD AS SCL_STAT_CDE /*점검상태*/ , M.CD_NM AS SCL_STAT_CDE_NAM , M.CD_NM AS NAM , SUM(CASE WHEN A.SCL_NUM IS NOT NULL THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) DATA_VAL FROM CD_DTL_INFO M LEFT JOIN FMS_CHSC_MA A ON (M.DTL_CD = A.SCL_STAT_CDE AND A.STA_YMD >= NVL(#pYm#, TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYYMM')) || '01' AND A.END_YMD <= TO_CHAR(LAST_DAY(NVL(#pYm#, TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYYMM')) || '01' ),'YYYYMMDD') ) WHERE 1=1 AND M.MST_CD = 'SCL_STAT_CDE' GROUP BY M.DTL_CD, M.CD_NM ORDER BY M.DTL_CD, M.CD_NM

/* Dash_SQL.selectDashChart4List - 4.시설물 현황(금일기준) */ SELECT M.TAB, M.TAB_NM, M.ORD , M.TAB_NM AS NAM , SUM(CASE WHEN FTR_CDE IS NOT NULL THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS DATA_VAL FROM (SELECT 'WTL_PIPE_LS' AS TAB, '상수관로' AS TAB_NM, 1 AS ORD FROM DUAL UNION ALL /*상수관로*/ IST_YMD SELECT 'WTL_VALV_PS' AS TAB, '변류시설' AS TAB_NM, 2 AS ORD FROM DUAL UNION ALL /*변류시설*/ IST_YMD SELECT 'WTL_FIRE_PS' AS TAB, '소방시설' AS TAB_NM, 3 AS ORD FROM DUAL UNION ALL /*소방시설*/ IST_YMD SELECT 'WTL_MANH_PS' AS TAB, '상수맨홀' AS TAB_NM, 4 AS ORD FROM DUAL UNION ALL /*상수맨홀*/ IST_YMD SELECT 'WTL_FLOW_PS' AS TAB, '유량계' AS TAB_NM, 5 AS ORD FROM DUAL UNION ALL /*유량계*/ IST_YMD SELECT 'WTL_STPI_PS' AS TAB, '스탠드파이프' AS TAB_NM, 6 AS ORD FROM DUAL UNION ALL /*스탠드파이프*/ IST_YMD SELECT 'WTL_PRGA_PS' AS TAB, '수압계' AS TAB_NM, 7 AS ORD FROM DUAL UNION ALL /*수압계*/ IST_YMD SELECT 'WTL_HEAD_PS' AS TAB, '수원지' AS TAB_NM, 8 AS ORD FROM DUAL UNION ALL /*수원지*/ FNS_YMD SELECT 'WTL_GAIN_PS' AS TAB, '취수장' AS TAB_NM, 9 AS ORD FROM DUAL UNION ALL /*취수장*/ FNS_YMD SELECT 'WTL_SERV_PS' AS TAB, '배수지' AS TAB_NM, 10 AS ORD FROM DUAL UNION ALL /*배수지*/ FNS_YMD SELECT 'WTL_PURI_AS' AS TAB, '정수장' AS TAB_NM, 11 AS ORD FROM DUAL UNION ALL /*정수장*/ FNS_YMD SELECT 'WTL_PRES_PS' AS TAB, '가압펌프장' AS TAB_NM, 12 AS ORD FROM DUAL UNION ALL /*가압펌프장*/ FNS_YMD SELECT 'WTL_SPLY_LS' AS TAB, '급수관로' AS TAB_NM, 13 AS ORD FROM DUAL UNION ALL /*급수관로*/ IST_YMD SELECT 'WTL_META_PS' AS TAB, '급수전계량기' AS TAB_NM, 14 AS ORD FROM DUAL UNION ALL /*급수전계량기*/ IST_YMD SELECT 'WTL_RSRV_PS' AS TAB, '저수조' AS TAB_NM, 15 AS ORD FROM DUAL /*저수조*/ FNS_YMD ) M LEFT JOIN V_FTR A ON (M.TAB = A.TAB ) WHERE 1=1 GROUP BY M.TAB, M.TAB_NM, M.ORD ORDER BY M.ORD

/* Dash_SQL.selectDashChart5List - 5.보수사유 현황(금일기준) */ SELECT M.DTL_CD AS RPR_CAT_CDE /* 보수구분 */ , M.CD_NM AS RPR_CAT_CDE_NAM , M.CD_NM AS NAM , SUM(CASE WHEN A.SCL_NUM IS NOT NULL THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) DATA_VAL FROM CD_DTL_INFO M LEFT JOIN FMS_CHSC_FTR_RES A ON (M.DTL_CD = A.RPR_CAT_CDE AND A.RPR_YMD LIKE NVL(#pYm#, TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYYMM')) || '%' ) WHERE 1=1 AND M.MST_CD = 'RPR_CAT_CDE' GROUP BY M.DTL_CD, M.CD_NM ORDER BY M.DTL_CD, M.CD_NM

/* Dash_SQL.selectDashChart6List - 6.공사 현황(금일기준) */ SELECT '상수공사' AS GBNAM , '상수공사' AS NAM , COUNT(*) AS DATA_VAL FROM WTT_CONS_MA /*상수공사대장*/ WHERE 1=1 AND BEG_YMD LIKE NVL(#pYm#, TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYYMM')) || '%' /*착수일자*/ UNION ALL SELECT '급수공사' AS GBNAM , '급수공사' AS NAM , COUNT(*) AS DATA_VAL FROM WTT_SPLY_MA /*급수공사대장*/ WHERE 1=1 AND BEG_YMD LIKE NVL(#pYm#, TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYYMM')) || '%' /*착수일자*/

/* Dash_SQL.selectDashChart7List - 7.소모품별 사용현황(금일기준) */ SELECT M.PDH_NUM , M.MNG_CDE_NAM , M.PDT_NAM , M.IN_AMT /*입고수량*/ , M.TOT_USE_AMT /*사용량*/ , M.IN_AMT - TOT_USE_AMT AS CUR_STCK_CNT /*현재고*/ , M.PDT_NAM AS NAM , M.TOT_USE_AMT AS DATA_VAL FROM (SELECT M.PDH_NUM , M.PDT_CAT_CDE , NVL(FN_GET_CD_DTL_INFO_NAME('PDT_CAT_CDE',M.PDT_CAT_CDE),M.PDT_CAT_CDE) AS MNG_CDE_NAM , M.PDT_NAM , NVL(SUM(A.IN_AMT),0) AS IN_AMT , NVL(SUM(CASE WHEN M.PDT_CAT_CDE = 'PDT_CAT_CDE001' THEN B.PDH_CNT /*소모품구분(소모품)*/ WHEN M.PDT_CAT_CDE = 'PDT_CAT_CDE002' THEN B.PDH_AMT /*소모품구분(오일)*/ ELSE 0 END),0) AS TOT_USE_AMT /*총사용량*/ FROM FMS_PDJT_MA M LEFT JOIN FMS_PDJT_IN_HT A ON ( M.PDH_NUM = A.PDH_NUM ) /*소모품 입고*/ LEFT JOIN FMS_PDJT_HT B ON ( M.PDH_NUM = B.PDH_NUM AND TO_CHAR(B.CRE_YMD,'YYYYMM') = NVL(#pYm#, TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYYMM')) ) /*소모품 사용*/ WHERE 1=1 AND M.USE_YN = 'Y' GROUP BY M.PDH_NUM, M.PDT_CAT_CDE, M.PDT_NAM ORDER BY 1 ) M
